Method.name: HEAD
Method.description: Checks that a token is valid and that it belongs to a specified tenant and service IDs, for performance.\n

Method.description: Checks that a token is valid and that it belongs to a specified tenant and service IDs. Returns the permissions for a particular client.\n

Method.description: Lists endpoints associated with a specific token.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Creates a logical router.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists logical routers that are accessible to the tenant who submits the request.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Updates a logical router.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a logical router and, if present, its external gateway interface.\n

Method.description: Shows details for a specified router.\n

Method.description: Removes an internal interface from a logical router.\n

Method.description: Creates a floating IP, and, if you specify port information, associates the floating IP with an internal port.\n

Method.description: Deletes a floating IP and, if present, its associated port.\n

Method.name: GET
